name: Barrel Defender
description:
INSTRUCTION

  • Get water from the tap next to the barrel.
  •  Get money by killing the zombies and skeletons. 
  •  Buy turret by clicking on the turret button (it will place where you are standing).
  •  Survive as long as you can and don't let them get to the barrel!

Description

Barrel defender is a game about shooting the undead and not letting them get to the barrel. The barrel is filled with the only water and the next one is a very long way away. You'r mission is to keep the barrel together by defending it by yourself, turrets and other defenses!

This game is still in developement and some textures are temporary.

(If you die just restart the page)

Version changelogs in the devlog section!
